name: Neuromancer (itch)
description:
Neuromancer A turn based Strategy game with a Cyberpunk theme

Created by Spencer Burke, Parker Allen, and Gregory Oyafuso

How to Play

Your characters are outlined in blue

AI characters are outlined in red

Health Bars are located below each character

 The Swordsman can move very far each turn, but can only attack in a 1 tile radius.

 The Ranger has a devastating long range attack, but limited mobility.

 The Psyonic can heal your own characters.

 The Hacker can launch an AOE cyber attack which damages all characters in a 1 tile radius around the target.
